participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Introverted and imaginative, often lost in their own world of fantasy.
participant_1.background: i faint at the sight of blood. i've an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games. my dream in life is to work from home. i dye my hair every three months.

participant_2.name: Alex
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, always looking for the next thrill in life.
participant_2.background: on weekends i do live action roleplaying events. i like donuts. i drive a ford pinto. i play a lot of call of duty.
